thread.title: Moldova fined over racist flags in European qualifier
thread.title_full: Moldova fined over racist flags in European qualifier

title: Moldova fined over racist flags in European qualifier
text:
Moldova fined over racist flags in European qualifier against Russia THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   9:13   9:13   
Subjects: 
Eastern Europe (362) 

MOSCOW — UEFA has hit Moldova with a fine and partial stadium closure after ruling its fans displayed racist flags during a European championship qualifying game. 
As well as the racism charge, Moldova was also punished for crowd disturbances and use of pyrotechnics during the Oct. 9 home game against Russia, which Moldova lost 2-1. 
Moldova must close part of its stadium for its next UEFA competitive home game and has been fined 15,000 euros ($16,600). 
There was a heated atmosphere at Moldova's game against Russia, with many home fans singing an offensive song about Russian President Vladimir Putin and some displaying the flag of neighboring Ukraine.
